full_description:
MSI PRO DP20ZA 5M Ryzen 5 5600G 256GB SSD 8GB RAM Mini PC

The MSI PRO DP20ZA 5M Mini PC offers the same performance as a large rig but is just 2.6L in size, making it portable. It is critical for you and your organization to have reliable and efficient power. The newest AMD Ryzen 5000 Series Socket AM4 Processors provide the utmost in high performance, whether you're crunching scientific data or developing a corporate logo. The MSI PRO DP20Z Mini PC, which supports 4K@60Hz, gives you the greatest experience possible while viewing movies with your family, participating in online conference calls while working from home, or learning professional skills at home. With one DP-out, one HDMI-out, and one VGA connector, the PRO DP20Z 5M allows you to extend three displays to pre-view your E-commerce content and data at home or in the workplace, increasing your efficiency. The MSI Center takes optimization to the next level with simply configurable system settings; it assists in prioritizing and allocating the resources at your disposal to speed up the performance of the applications you use every day.
